Uses of Class
io.protostuff.LinkedBuffer

  • Packages that use LinkedBuffer 
    Package Description
    io.protostuff  

    • Uses of LinkedBuffer in io.protostuff

      Fields in io.protostuff declared as LinkedBuffer 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      LinkedBuffer WriteSession.head
      The main/root/head buffer of this write session.
      protected LinkedBuffer WriteSession.tail
      The last buffer of this write session (This points to head if growing not needed).
